short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Added click to call and notifications to Hubspot

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With our extension you can call directly from CRM, see caller's information (number, contact name, organization name) and check the contact's or organization's details while talking to a customer. 

Install the extension and enter your CRM account to make and receive calls like a pro!
